title: Low priority queue even after being away for a year?
body: I havent played League in over a whole year, decided to come back because I was bored and bam 20 minute LPQ, I dont remember if this is the only one or if I have multiple LPQs to wait through, but it seems a bit silly to have the LPQs have no expiry date. I literally havent played for like 10 months, do I need to sit through a 20 minute queue? Multiple times? Ugh

replies.body:
||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||https://puu.sh/w7cMG/7dd5ea0998.png|
|-
